title: About
content: Hi, my name's Connor. I'm a multipurpose software engineer, specializing in simulation systems. My experience includes 2 years of DoD contracting, 2 years of military aircrew experience, and many years of contributing to open source software and miscellaneous paid projects for clients.
Here are the languages I'm most familiar with (listed most to least comfortable): Golang, Python, C, C++, HTML/JS/CSS, Perl, Ada, Fortran?, MATLAB
